data.name: Case 03: True Cannibal Boy
data.detailed_description:
Physical Exorcism Series

This work and the following game(s) are part of the Physical Exorcism Series. You will see some of the same characters across the series, but the stories are independent of each other and can be enjoyed separately.

THE PREQUEL 1 TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1959530/

THE PREQUEL 2 TO THIS WORK

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662340/


About the Game

A short anti-classic JRPG. Step into the roles of a handsome moneygrubber and a female psychopath as they take on an exorcism job that pits them against the evil spirit they were destined to face...

Features



An RPG that's short and subversive
Are you sick of being the hero who always has to save the world? Do you want to exchange the tropes of friendship, effort, and victory for a story with anti-heroes as the protagonists? Are you fed up with dozens of hours of adventure and just want something that fits into one night? Then this is the game for you!

Difficulty options to match your playing style
Do you just want to enjoy getting through the story or are you eager to challenge mighty foes? This game's difficulty modes range from Combat-free Mode to Extreme Mode to meet different playing styles!

Turn-based combat without the grind
No grinding or item farming! Winning in combat relies on strategy, so put the strengths of your allies to good use and exploit the weaknesses of your enemies!

Characters




Bruce "Brucie" Lyne
A member of the exorcist duo Ghosteaters. He believes in money more than people.


Jadrienne "Jade" Lee
The other member of the Ghosteaters. Her interest is in observing people.


Cannibal Boy
An "evil spirit" from an urban legend. He severs his victims' necks with his teeth.


Marty and Sally
A couple. They encountered the Cannibal Boy and disappeared.


Lucia "Lucy" White
A former client of the Ghosteaters. She owes them a huge favor.


Wong Ting-ting
A Taoist priestess. She is also an exorcist.

  • Storage: 512 MB available space
